properties.description: Scheduled to trigger once at 10:15pm, Everyday
Runs the pipelines to copy across posted transactions and Allocations
Moves files loaded to the Fusion Container in the averyblob storage account, to the averyblobfileshare. So they can be copied off the file share to a location on the VM

activities.name: Archive files
activities.description: Moves the files to archive folder in the container

properties.description: Scheduled to trigger once at 10pm, on Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri
Once a month on the 1st at 5am
Executes at 19:45 on the 27th of each Month for the Exchequer Company Access audit report.
Runs the pipeline to move files from fusion to the file share so they can be loaded onto the VM
